config_part.ioc_details: Helium Level Meter V1 from Cryogenic Ltd

macro.name: BAUD
macro.description: Serial communication baud rate, defaults to 9600.

macro.name: BITS
macro.description: Serial communication number of bits, defaults to 8.

macro.name: PARITY
macro.description: Serial communication parity, defaults to none.

macro.name: STOP
macro.description: Serial communication stop bit, defaults to 1.

macro.name: HIHI_LEVEL_ALARM
macro.description: Level above which a major alarm should be triggered.

macro.name: HIGH_LEVEL_ALARM
macro.description: Level above which a minor alarm should be triggered.

macro.name: LOW_LEVEL_ALARM
macro.description: Level below which a minor alarm should be triggered.

macro.name: LOLO_LEVEL_ALARM
macro.description: Level below which a major alarm should be triggered.
